channel.title: [poll] So... do you stay if you're killed early?
channel.description: [poll type=multiple min=1 max=4] * Yes * No * Yes, if there is Priest * I am evil [/poll]

item.title: [poll] So... do you stay if you're killed early?
item.dc:creator: Scoundrella
item.description:
I actually really like the revive mechanic having been changed to the death knight. Pre-change, if you had a Prince die n1 and they left… the priest (and bd) was in a bit of a tough spot.

But now since any bd can come back as the same class, that problem is gone.

I leave depending on the situation. If I am fool and die N1, yes, i might leave. I also might stay though as I honestly enjoy spectating and the guessing who will die. if BD/unseen i stay unless something comes up

Read full topic
item.source: [poll] So... do you stay if you're killed early?

item.title: [poll] So... do you stay if you're killed early?
item.dc:creator: Navi
item.description:
I generally stay until the next BD dies. That way I can give the psychic any extra info I have, and physicians will have a reanimate target if they decide to use it early.

Read full topic
item.source: [poll] So... do you stay if you're killed early?

item.title: [poll] So... do you stay if you're killed early?
item.dc:creator: DeathReaperRH
item.description:
Dude if you in my match and im BD.Here is my strat to let BD win.If your purple/red tell everyone who is purple/red.And BAM Bd win. EZ BD win right?Totally legit strat and 10-12 people will love you while 2-4 people might hate you.But its all for more people win right?
People will love your sacrifice.This is a 100% approved by the BD.
(We dont talk about how the unseen/cult feels bc they are irrelevant)

Read full topic
item.source: [poll] So... do you stay if you're killed early?

item.title: [poll] So... do you stay if you're killed early?
item.dc:creator: z0mbiepete
item.description:

item.source: [poll] So... do you stay if you're killed early?

item.title: [poll] So... do you stay if you're killed early?
item.dc:creator: JCosi
item.description:
It is distinct if you’re neutral (and not won as fool etc), because you have no investment in what team will win. In my opinion they leave more often when killed than BD/unseen/cult.

Read full topic
